channel.title: How do I give firecape an animation?
channel.description:
This is currently how my firecape looks:
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/691/captureqnp.png/][IMG]http://img691.imageshack.us/img691/4870/captureqnp.png[/img][/URL]
I'm guessing that just means it's not coded in or it's just a custom look, but either way I want to change it to how it's supposed to look, can someone explain (with good detail) how I change it to the regular look? With the lava flowing down it too.

item.title: How do I give firecape an animation?
item.dc:creator: @arrogantlyfly arrogantlyfly
item.description:
@arrogantlyfly wrote:

I looked up all codes for firecapes, they were all white, all 3 of them. And i couldn’t weild them. Does anyone know how to fix this??

Read full topic
item.source: How do I give firecape an animation?

item.title: How do I give firecape an animation?
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Oh cause that’s how it looked for me when i used a webclient from there… There should be 2 fire capes, try them both.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I give firecape an animation?
